title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonicsb. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeNamef. The label could say 'Select destination type:'g. The browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)c. The title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'. Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.e. The destination type can be the source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo-changes in all referencing classes.
OB: The browse button size is too small. The title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it displays the message 'Type not found'. The dialog shows types that are not from the source folders of the own project. The refactoring warns about errors when the destination type is the same as the source type, which is incorrect and causes changes in all referencing classes.
SR: 1. Open the dialog. 2. Observe that the browse button size is too small. 3. Go to the next page and check the title for long text. 4. Go to the next page again and ensure that the message 'Type not found' is displayed. 5. Check that only types from the source folders of the own project are shown in the dialog. 6. Perform a refactoring where the destination type is the same as the source type and confirm that the warning about errors is incorrect and it causes changes in all referencing classes.
